short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An extension that changes the way the USP College moodle website behaves.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Makes several improvements and changes to portal.uspcollege.ac.uk/moodle/ and other moodle based websites. Heres some of the things you can do :
Add a custom youtube video
Change the theme
Remove Ads
Remove unnecessary clutter

Version 1.2.4:
Fixed Alignment of backup text
Backup text now appears on all subpages
Custom footer messages have been tweaked
USP Flash can be turned off on the splash page
Physics Students can now find a backup link on the physics page

Version 1.2.3:
Fixed internal clock not pulling month correctly

Version 1.2.2:
Fixed some minor issues
Added Transparent Theme
Added True USP Theme
Added Custom Footer
Added Events on specific days

Version 1.2.1:
Added Version Checker
Fixed Wrapping on settings menu
Added extra padding to iFrames

Version 1.2.0:
Removed Disclaimer
Removed Badges
Removed Upcoming events
Removed Notification Bell
Removed Rhubarb and Custard theme
Removed Pastel theme
Removed Tartan theme
Changed Navigation links so they no longer appear bold
Changed "Dawn" to "HellSpawn"
Changed "Cotten Candy" to "Cotton Candy"
Changed "Cotten Candy" to be more readable
Added Dynamic HomePage
Cursor become pointer when touching a link
Added Baby Blue theme
Added new layout to settings menu
Settings Menu now has more descriptions
Settings Page now changes theme
Fixed Side Menu Bug

Version 1.1.8:
Added Dawn Theme
Added Tartan Theme
Made links more visible by making them bold
Removed a test statement

Version 1.1.7:
Added pastel theme

Version 1.1.6:
Added Cotton Candy Theme
Added Rhubarb and Custard Theme

Version 1.1.5:
Upgraded Vomit Theme

Version 1.1.4:
Made Dark theme Darker!
Fixed a few styling issues
Added extra fluffy cuddles

Version 1.1.3:
Added an archive for computer science documents

Version 1.1.2:
-Updated the extension to fix new webpage update
-You can now remove the stupid timer
-Fixed links being unreadable
-Worked out what department the swimming costumes are in

Version 1.1.1:
-Fixed a styling error on the lessons page
-Added extra love and hugs to the text

Version 1.1.0 :
-Fixed styling issues
-Changed tree theme to be easier on the eyes
-Added the ability to play Youtube videos
-Cut down storage by 8Kb
-Added the option to remove/add side menus
-Updated settings text
-Updated Versioning system
-Removed original video system
-Made more animals happy out of ten
